officialTitle: Clinical and Pharmacogenetic Study of Attention Deficit With Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
inclusionCriteria:
* ADHD
* Must have minimum age of 6 Years
* Must have maximum age of 12 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Psychosis
* Tourette syndrome
* Intelligence quotient (IQ) \< 70
* Pervasive developmental disorder (PDD)
